strings.RETRAIN_POPUP_MESSAGE: Retraining will return this Hero's Stat Points and allow you to spend them again.
strings.ABANDON_ITEMS_MESSAGE:
You have unclaimed loot.
Leave anyway?
strings.SUMMARY_INVENTORY_FULL_MESSAGE: These items will not fit in your inventory. You can sell or equip items to make room.
strings.SELF_REVIVE_PANEL_INNER:
CONTINUE FIGHTING BY DOING 
ONE OF THE FOLLOWING:
strings.INFINITE_FLOORS_POPUP: Complete Floor 15 To Get A Trophy!
strings.INFINITE_BEAT: BEAT YOUR WEEKLY SCORE TO GET NEW LOOT
strings.ITEM_CARD_UNUSABLE_LEVEL: This weapon is too high level for the selected Hero.
strings.ITEM_CARD_UNUSABLE_MASTERCLASS: This weapon class is not usable by the selected Hero.
strings.EQUIP_POPUP_MESSAGE:
CHOOSE A SLOT
TO EQUIP THIS ITEM
strings.STACK_PICKER_MESSAGE: EQUIPPED BOOSTERS ARE IMMEDIATELY ACTIVE AT THE START OF YOUR NEXT DUNGEON.
strings.STACK_NOT_ALLOWED_MESSAGE: You cannot equip more than one booster of the same type.
strings.UI_HUD_EXIT_MESSAGE: Exit this dungeon and return to town? You will forfeit any treasures collected and experience bonus.
strings.II_UI_HUD_EXIT_MESSAGE: Returning to town will forfeit your Treasure and Victory Reward earned so far in the Dungeon:
strings.SHOP_NOT_ENOUGH_CASH_MESSAGE: You do not have enough Gems to buy that item.
strings.SHOP_NOT_ENOUGH_COINS_MESSAGE: You do not have enough Coins to buy that item. You can buy Coins or earn them in the dungeon.
strings.SHOP_NOT_HIGH_LEVEL_MESSAGE:
You do not own a hero that is high enough level to use this item.
You can still buy the item but will not be able to use it yet.
strings.SHOP_WEAPON_INVENTORY_FULL_MESSAGE: You cannot fit these weapons in your inventory. You can sell weapons or buy more storage.
strings.SHOP_WEAPON_STORAGE_LIMIT_MESSAGE: Purchasing this extra weapon storage would exceed the 120 item storage limit.
strings.SHOP_STACK_LIMIT_MESSAGE: Purchasing this offer would exceed a storage limit.

HERO_UPSELL_CAPTION_1.RANGER: MASTER THE POWERFUL ICE AND FIRE BOWS!
HERO_UPSELL_CAPTION_1.SORCERER: SHOCK AND STUN FOES WITH CHAIN LIGHTNING!
HERO_UPSELL_CAPTION_1.BATTLE_CHEF: COOK FOOD TO HEAL YOUR FRIENDS!
HERO_UPSELL_CAPTION_1.VAMPIRE_HUNTER: LAY TRAPS AND LURE ENEMIES TO THEIR DOOM!

HERO_UPSELL_BUSTER_MESSAGE.RANGER: FIRE 3 PIERCING WAVES OF ARROWS AT YOUR ENEMIES!
HERO_UPSELL_BUSTER_MESSAGE.SORCERER: SUMMON BALLS OF LIGHTNING TO ORBIT YOU AS AN ELECTRIFYING SHIELD!
HERO_UPSELL_BUSTER_MESSAGE.BATTLE_CHEF: COWS RAIN OUT OF THE SKY, DECIMATING ENEMIES AND EXPLODING INTO HAMBURGERS FOR HEALING!
HERO_UPSELL_BUSTER_MESSAGE.VAMPIRE_HUNTER: DEVASTATE ENEMIES WITH A DEFENSIVE RING OF GARLIC NUKE PROXIMITY MINES
HERO_UPSELL_BUSTER_MESSAGE.GHOST_SAMURAI: SUMMONS THREE SAMURAI ARMOR CLONES TO FIGHT FOR YOU!
HERO_UPSELL_BUSTER_MESSAGE.PYROMANCER: THERE'S NO ESCAPING THE WRATH OF A FIRE DEMON!
HERO_UPSELL_BUSTER_MESSAGE.DRAGON_KNIGHT: SUMMONS AN ARMY OF DRAGONS TO DEVOUR ENEMIES!

strings.NO_PET_EQUIPPED_TOOLTIP_DESCRIPTION: Purchase a pet from the shop for furry rampaging!
strings.CASH_PAGE_MESSAGE: USE GEMS TO BUY CHARACTERS, WEAPONS, AND MORE!
strings.CASH_PAGE_MESSAGE_DRAGON_KNIGHT_EXCLUSIV: LIMITED TIME OFFER: Spend $10 or more and get FREE stuff! ($20 Value!)
strings.LEADERBOARD_FB_REMOVE_FRIEND_POPUP_DESC:
This Friend is a Facebook friend.
You must use Facebook's Friends
list to remove them.
strings.LEADERBOARD_KG_REMOVE_FRIEND_POPUP_DESC:
This Friend is a Kongregate friend.
You must use Kongregate's Friends
list to remove them.
strings.LEADERBOARD_DR_REMOVE_FRIEND_POPUP_DESC_:
from your
friends list in Dungeon Rampage?
strings.DRINVITE_FRIEND_EMAIL_TEXT: Search for a friend via email :
strings.//DRINVITE_FAILED_POPUP_DESC:
This e-mail address is not registered.
Would you like to invite this friend
to play Dungeon Rampage
with you?
strings.DRINVITE_FAILED_POPUP_DESC: Oh, it looks like your friend doesn’t have an account on Dungeon Rampage.  Would you like to send an email inviting your friend to play with you?
strings.INVITE_POPUP_MESSAGE:
Invite friends to join you in LIVE multiplayer action!
More friends = More firepower!
strings.FACEBOOK_LOGOUT:
Your login timed out. 
Please click Reload.
strings.SOCKET_CLOSE_60_TEXT:
There is a lot of rampaging right now. 
 
  Our server is full. Come back shortly
strings.TUTORIAL_UNLOCK_DESC: Click Unlock to open the chest! Or “Keep” it for later!
strings.TUTORIAL_OUTOFKEYS_DESC: If you don’t have a key, you can open it with coins or gems
strings.TUTORIAL_REVEALLOOT_DESC: Great find! Your loot is your inventory!
strings.TUTORIAL_COOLDOWN_DESC: When weapon dial refills your weapon is ready to use again !
strings.TUTORIAL_SCALING_DESC: Hold down your key to make it more effective !
strings.TUTORIAL_REPEATER_DESC: Hold down your key to make it fire faster !
strings.SURVEY_POPUP_MESSAGE: Please tell us what you think of Dungeon Rampage!
strings.BETA_KEYS_POPUP_MESSAGE:
Use keys to unlock all-new chests in every dungeon and get boosters, premium weapons, and more!

As a thank you for playing Dungeon Rampage, we've granted you 15 keys to get started!
strings.BETA_REWARDS_POPUP_MESSAGE:
As a thank you for Rampaging
through Dinglepus' dungeon
during our Beta, we want you
to have our exclusive -
strings.CASH_TOOLTIP_DESCRIPTION: Purchase these and use them to unlock exclusive characters, weapons, and items in the Shop.
strings.COIN_TOOLTIP_DESCRIPTION: Earn these in Dungeons. You can spend Coins in the Shop to buy new weapons and items.
strings.TROPHIES_TOOLTIP_DESCRIPTION: Earn Trophies by defeating bosses and special dungeons to show off your swanky rampaging skills!
strings.TEAM_BONUS_TOOLTIP_DESCRIPTION: Earn extra rewards for each additional hero you own!
strings.GIFT_POPUP_INFO_MESSAGE: Gifts can be found in the Storage/Stuff tab. You can have only 99 of each type.
strings.DAILY_REWARDS_COMEBACK: Come back every day to win gold and fabulous prizes!
strings.DAILY_REWARDS_ALREADY: YOU'VE ALREADY REDEEMED A FREE REWARD TODAY!
strings.DAILY_REWARDS_ALREADY_GOLD: GOLD ONLY GIVEN ONCE A DAY!
strings.REWARD_POPUP_HEADER: YOU HAVE RECEIVED A FREE GIFT
strings.REWARD_ERROR_POPUP_TITLE_1104: OOPS! WE’RE OUT OF THIS REWARD
strings.VICTORY_SCREEN_BLOCK_POPUP_MESSAGE: will not be able to communicate with you or join your dungeons.
strings.FRIEND_MANAGEMENT_DESCRIPTION_FRIENDS: Below are your friends! Use the checkboxes to 'remove' or send 'gifts' to friends.
strings.FRIEND_MANAGEMENT_DESCRIPTION_PENDING: Accept incoming friend request to play with them in a dungeon.
strings.FRIEND_MANAGEMENT_DESCRIPTION_BLOCKED: Ignored players below will have their posts or shares hidden. Select and 'Revert' if needed.
strings.FRIEND_MANAGEMENT_DESCRIPTION_INVITE: The more friends you have, the more you can rampage with! Search for or invite new friends.
strings.FRIEND_MANAGEMENT_DESCRIPTION_INVITE_2:
Send and receive gifts when you
invite friends! The more friends
you have, the more awesome
gifts you can receive. Search for
your friends or invite them to
come rampage with you!
strings.GO_TO_INVENTORY_BODY: To Keep This Chest, you will need to free up space in your storage.
strings.GO_TO_INVENTORY_BODY_OPEN: To Open This Chest, you will need to free up space in your storage.
strings.HEADER_KEY_TOOLTIP_DESC: Earn or purchase keys to unlock chests with weapons, potions and more.
strings.ABANDON_CHEST_POPUP_DESC: Do you really want to Abandon this chest ?
strings.BUY_KEY_TO_OPEN: Buy a key to open this
strings.PURCHASE_AND_OPEN_CHEST_TEXT_CONTENT: Purchase and open chest with this hero.
strings.CLEAR_INVENTORY: Clear space in your storage to open this chest
strings.DR_APOLOGY_CONTENT:
Coming soon – Gem Purchasing!

 We are not yet able to process payments at this time, but stay tuned as this is coming very soon.

 You can still rampage and level up your Hero as you would normally.
strings.PYROMANCER_DESC: Check out the Blazing Master of Fire above.
strings.INVENTORY_STUFF_DESCRIPTION: EQUIP BOOSTERS FOR ALL YOUR HEROES IN THIS PANEL.
strings.ZERO_OFFER_DESCRIPTION: Congratulations! You have purchased all available items in this tab.
strings.STORAGE_FULL_DESCRIPTION: Your inventory is currently filled up. Add more storage or make space in your inventory.
strings.DRAGON_KNIGHT_UPSELL_POPUP_TEXT: YO DOG. I HEARD YOU LIKED DRAGONS.  AND KNIGHTS.  SO WE DRAGONED YOUR KNIGHT SO YOU CAN DRAGON WHILE YOU PWN!

errors.DEF: Your pardons, Hero, but an error has prevented your rampage. Please refresh your browser to continue!
errors.110: Ultimate Rampaging in progress!  Your friend is currently competing in an Ultimate Rampage dungeon.  No more Heroes may join after Floor 1 is completed!
errors.502: We're sorry, but the dungeon we tried to place you in is already full! Please try again!
errors.504: We're sorry, but the dungeon your friend is rampaging in is already full!
errors.601: 601: Game server socket closed. Check your internet connection or try again later.
errors.602: 602: IO Error connecting to game server. Check your internet connection or try again later.
errors.603: 603: Security error connecting to game server. Check your internet connection or try again later.
errors.1101: Hmm, it seems that you’ve tried to claim a reward that isn’t in our system. Please double-check the spelling and URL and try again.
errors.1102: It looks like you are trying to claim a reward that you have already redeemed. This reward can only be redeemed once per player.
errors.1103: Unfortunately this reward link has already expired.  Please check out our Fan Page or Like Us on Facebook to be notified of future rewards.
errors.1104: Unfortunately, all of the available rewards have already been claimed. Please check out our Fan Page or Like Us on Facebook to be notified of future rewards.
errors.1105: To claim your reward, you’ll need to make more room in your Storage by selling/using items or adding more space. Once you have space, you can click the reward link again to get your item.
